itunes:subtitle: When it comes to the "right" type of love, focusing on our self love is the best love we can give ourselves this holiday season.  In this episodes, we talk about 3 reasons that's the case.    GRAB A BLACK FRIDAY BUNDLE  JOIN THE...
itunes:summary:
When it comes to the "right" type of love, focusing on our self love is the best love we can give ourselves this holiday season. 

In this episodes, we talk about 3 reasons that's the case.
